Pulsepoint | New York, NY | ONSITE | Full-Time

Pulsepoint is hiring a Director of Engineering and a Scala or Java developer!

* Director of Engineering (http://www.pulsepoint.com/job-board.html?gh_jid=172635)

* Senior Scala Engineer (http://www.pulsepoint.com/job-board.html?gh_jid=15176)

Contact me directly (I'm an engineer here) to apply! Email: jmena@pulsepoint.com
